question: I've been on met for two months second time around, Diet, excercise and see no results.  I have metabolic symdrome and IR.  I have slowly gained 11lbs, while I was pleading with every doctor in town, before I finally found one that was able to diagnose me.  Women have no validity when they go to the doctor with unexplained weight gain.  I'm will to do what it takes to get it off.  I'm on the road to being a diabetic.  I have family history of diabetes and want to gain control of my future.
title: What is the best diet to follow inconjunction with Metformin
